column4: wow vlc is getting action today.....  man guys what about xmms
mpd / ncmpd too diff. for me.... lol
well guys it's great to be back.....  i just had a 4 month run with gentoo........never going back to that, yea optization is there but man, too much configing.... i miss my ubuntu family...   lol
i had a hard time with dapper 64, so thats why i wanted to exper.
best torrent app, i used bittorent but it's slow anything faster?
I use azureus. Keep in mind torrents speed up the longer you run them, cause they find more peers
i couldn't get azureu to config.
Ive heard lots of people say that.  I've never had a problem with it though
u use it for torrents or for peer sharing?
i thought azu was for like peer sharing networks only not for like torrent sites.
azureues has some plugins that do some wild stuff like distributed tracking and importing torrents from RSS feeds, but basically its a bit torrent client.
i'll check out further, what's ur avg dl speed?
